lyrics.text: Lesson 42. Not very musical. First listen and then answer the question. What happened
lyrics.translation: 第42课。不太擅长音乐。首先听录音，然后回答问题。发生了什么事

lyrics.text: when the snake charmer began to play jazz? As we had had a long walk through one of the
lyrics.translation: 当耍蛇人开始演奏爵士乐时？正如我们刚刚穿过其中之一

lyrics.text: markets of old Delhi, we stopped at a square to have a rest. After a time, we noticed a
lyrics.translation: 旧德里的市场，我们在广场上停下来休息。过了一会儿，我们注意到一个

lyrics.text: snake charmer with two large baskets at the other side of the square, so we went to have
lyrics.translation: 耍蛇人在广场的另一边，有两个大篮子，所以我们过去看

lyrics.text: a look at him. As soon as he saw us, he picked up a long pipe which was covered with coins and
lyrics.translation: 看他一眼。他一看到我们，就拿起一根上面覆盖着硬币的长管子

lyrics.text: opened one of the baskets. When he began to play a tune, we had our first glimpse of the
lyrics.translation: 他打开了一个篮子。当他开始演奏一首曲子时，我们第一次瞥见了

lyrics.text: snake. It rose out of the basket and began to follow the movements of the pipe. We were very
lyrics.translation: 蛇。它从篮子里升起，开始跟随管子的动作。我们非常

lyrics.text: much surprised when the snake charmer suddenly began to play jazz and modern pop songs. The snake,
lyrics.translation: 当耍蛇人突然开始演奏爵士乐和现代流行歌曲时，我感到非常惊讶。那条蛇，

lyrics.text: however, continued to dance slowly. He obviously could not tell the difference between Indian music
lyrics.translation: 然而，他继续缓慢地跳舞。他显然无法分辨印度音乐
